title: i feel you (2015) by Petra Cortright
content:
i feel u 
 Petra Cortright 
2015, 2 min, webcam video, dimensions variable, color, sound 
Courtesy the artist and Foxy Production , New York. 
Screening at Dinca Vision Quest 2015 
Thursday, September 10, 2015, 7pm, Museum of Contemporary Art Chicago 
Visit dincavisionquest.com for more info.
